sentence.text: One hundred firemen tackled the blaze .
Firemen tackled a blaze in a garage at Beckenham Gardens , Hemlington , Middlesbrough , which destroyed the building and a car inside .
Firemen tackled a blaze in buildings at Tees Grange Farm , Coniscliffe Road , Darlington , at about 4.10 pm yesterday.Five tons of baled straw were destroyed .
Firemen tackled a blaze in the kitchen of a flat in The Esplanade , Redcar last night .
Firefighters tackle blazes at farm and empty house
Firefighters tackled a blaze which severely damaged a bungalow in Micklow Close , Redcar , and caused smoke damage of adjoining properties .
Fire crews tackled the second blaze in three days in an empty house in Trent Street , Middlesbrough yesterday .
Firefighters tackle blazes at farm and empty house
About 100 firefighters tackled the blaze whose heat damaged windows of nearby houses .
Detectives launched an enquiry after the body of Michael Chatfield was found as firemen fought a blaze in a three storey house .
One hundred firemen tackled the blaze .
Firefighters tackle factory blaze
They were turned away as eight fire engines brought firefighters to tackle the blaze at St Anselm and Cecilia church in Holborn , London .
House blaze : Fire crews were called out to tackle a blaze at a house in The Greenway , Middleton St George yesterday .
Three appliances and a hydraulic platform tackled the blaze .
It took more than an hour to control the blaze at the former Langham Hotel .
Four people have perished so far in the blazes which the government says were started intentionally by arsonists over a week ago .
For a short time , at least 100 hikers were trapped in the mountains and a boy scout camp was also threatened by the blaze .
Several people celebrating a wedding have also been trapped by the fire but are not injured and authorities say they are in no danger from the blaze .
The first , a 8,000 hectare blaze near Blackheath , which has been burning for nine days broke containment lines at 11 PM AEDT on Monday .
The blaze started burning last Wednesday north of Los Angeles .
Currently , twenty-two percent of the blaze is contained , rising from only five percent as little as a day ago .
Two firefighters were killed in the blaze on Sunday , after fires burnt their vehicle on front lines .
